SELECT QNA_NO,CATEGORY_NM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_WRITER, QNA_CREATE_DATE, QNA_STATUS , MEMBER_NICK, LIKE_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY R WHERE R.PARENT_BOARD_NO=Q.QNA_NO AND REPLY_STATUS='Y') RCNT FROM QNABOARD Q JOIN QNA_CATEGORY ON (QNA_CATEGORY=CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(QNA_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE QNA_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNABOARD VALUES ( #{qnaNo}, #{qnaTitle}, 'Y', DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaCategory}, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE QNABOARD SET QNA_CATEGORY = #{qnaCategory}, QNA_TITLE = #{qnaTitle}, QNA_CONTENT = #{qnaContent}, QNA_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}
